posts.name: Jessica Smith
posts.cooked:
Welcome to the Weekly Roundup!

07/05/21 - 07/11/21
Issue - V60
Current Release: 0.84.1

Every week we’ll share community-driven apps and articles that were shared with us during the previous week as well as any major announcements from Streamlit. If there is anything we missed feel free to add it in a comment or @ us on Twitter!

  • = articles
  • = videos
  • = apps

Streamlit Updates

  • Check out the Streamlit sharing badge for your GitHub repos:
  • Session state is here! Now you can store info across app interactions and reruns! Read more here and try out the demo app
  • Listen to @Amanda_Kelly talk about her career journey in this Founders You Should Know interview with Renaissance Collective
  • Check out the June Rewind and see who got App of the Month!

Featured Content

  • How to use Streamlit in 30 Minutes! (Streamlit Tutorials 01.01) @wjbmattingly
  • Generate ASCII images using GAN @jojo96
  • Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF Viewer

Tutorials/Introduction

  • How to Add Session State to Streamlit Python @Jesse_JCharis
  • StreamLit Workshop by Omdena
  • Salary Prediction Machine Learning Web App using Streamlit Library | Data Science # 1
  • Webcam Web Application using Streamlit & Python
  • The Best Data Science Framework You’ve Never Heard Of
  • Streamlit com matplotlib | Crie aplicativos WEB em python com gráficos
  • Web Apps com Streamlit: Passo a Passo do Zero [Imersão FLAI em Projetos de Data Science]
  • OpenCV, NumPy and Streamlit Walked Into A… @ericgitonga
  • Create boxplot using Streamlit and Plotly express OpenCharts
  • Create Density contour charts using Streamlit and Plotly express (OpenCharts)

  • Create Violinplots using Streamlit and Plotly express (OpenCharts)
  • An Enterprise Data App Framework using Streamlit and Google Cloud
  • Streamlit just got a massive update! Is this the best GUI for Python now?
  • EP5. Adding Media Files in our Streamlit Web App
  • Creating and Deploying a Cat-Dog Image Classifier using TensorFlow and Streamlit- Part 2
  • A Simple sentiment analysis of tweets containing with the help of AWS/TWEEPY
  • Deployment of Machine Learning Application Made Easy
  • EP5. Adding Media Files in Streamlit || The Streamlit basics Tutorial Series || Adith Sreeram.
  • EP6. Recieving input from the user || The Streamlit basics Tutorial Series || Adith Sreeram.
  • Tutorial 1 - Introduction to Data Visualization & Streamlit | Data Science | Dashboards | Analytics
  • Tutorial 2 - Streamlit Installation | How to install streamlit? | Streamlit tutorial | Web-App Demo
  • DSI Summer Workshops: Taking Your Data Science Live with streamlit
  • [Streamlit] Creating Fast Web Apps in Python #01
  • how to insert data using database and streamlit
  • Streamlit | Win Prediction Analytics | Heroku Deployment | App Demo |
  • Face Detection & Counter App using #python #streamlit #facedetection
  • Basic Face Detection Web App in 10 minutes with Python, OpenCV and Streamlit
  • Machine Learning Web App Super Simple with Python and Streamlit. Part 01
  • About my ML project
  • 【Streamlit】Session Stateで変数の値を保持する方法
  • How to get the uploaded file path and processing its file in Streamlit
  • My First Python App Using Streamlit

Science and Tech

  • PHYSBO Simulation
  • Breast cancer risk estimation

NLP and Language

  • yPoemas @nando_lopes
  • Create a Word Cloud for any URL
  • Synthia @Diego_Lopez_Yse
  • Twitter Sentiment Analysis
  • Text to Speech IBM Spanish @felipesanma
  • Email/SMS Spam Classifier
  • WhatsApp Chat Processor

Data Visualization

  • XKCD-style Graphs
  • Video Games Analysis
  • stackOverTime

CV and Images

  • MNIST-Drawer
  • Face Detection App
  • Optical Character Recognizer
  • Face Recognition System
  • Face Mesh App
  • Hand Tracking in Pictures using Google’s MediaPipe Hands
  • Image dehazing

General

Model Building and Training

Follow us
